name: Bumpy Tip
description:
Is as simple synchro board game that will train your focus and reflex to tap the right piece according to the random pop-up direction as fast as possible and packed with some cute graphic and funny sounds to spice up your game

There are multiple unique theme that you can unlock in the game like new year theme with the fireworks or Christmas theme with santa and their elf.

You can share your high score and challenge your friend and make them vertigo or try to beat the best of the best in our leader board.

So let's have some tapping fun..

Feature:

- Multiple unlockable theme

- Cute graphical and funny sound

- Reward

- Facebook connect and leader-board

Future Update:

- Achievements

- Challenge friend (online)
